data.title: Creative Software For Professionals | We Are Affinity
data.description: Subscription-free photo editing, page layout, graphic design and illustration apps for professionals. Try for free or buy for one low payment.
data.content:
Creative Software For Professionals | We Are Affinity
===============                              

Our cookies

We use cookies to improve your experience on our website and to show you personalised content. You can accept all or manage them individually.

Reject non-essentialAccept allManage cookies

![Image 2: Affinity Photo used to edit beautiful landscape photo of pink and purple sunset over snow-capped mountains](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/home/0824/banner-060820241344--md@2x.webp)

We are Affinity.
================

Award-winning photo editing, graphic design and page layout software for Mac, Windows & iPad.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   Impressively fast and remarkably smooth
*   All the tools you need without the bloat
*   One shared file format for a seamless workflow
*   Built with the latest tech, for the latest tech
*   Fully featured across all platforms
*   No subscription needed

![Image 3: Affinity Designer brand logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/logos/affinity-designer-2-dark-landscape-090520190839.svg) [(1945)](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/reviews/)The top choice of thousands of illustrators, designers, game developers and other pros, this vector graphics software can be used to create digital illustrations, concept art, unique graphics, logos, brand designs, web mock-ups and so much more.

[More info \- about Affinity Designer](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/designer/)

![Image 4: Front of baby blue sports car with orange detailing and number 2 on it being edited in the Layers panel of Affinity Designer](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/designer/home/0322/live/complex-040420220922--sm@2x.jpg)

![Image 5: Affinity Photo brand logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/logos/affinity-photo-2-dark-landscape-090520190839.svg) [(2868)](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/reviews/)As the only fully-loaded photo editor integrated across macOS, Windows and iPad, Affinity Photo 2 is fast becoming the industry standard for image editing – perfect for everything from basic edits and retouching to creating impressive multilayer photo compositions.

[More info \- about Affinity Photo](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/photo/)

![Image 6: Woman in denim shirt with yellow sunglasses, face piercings and curly black hair being cut out](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/photo/home/0322/selections/precise-070420221559--sm@2x.jpg)

![Image 7: Affinity Publisher brand logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/logos/affinity-publisher-2-dark-landscape-090520190839.svg) [(2135)](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/reviews/)Whether you’re creating magazines, posters, newsletters, bid documents, brochures or other materials, this groundbreaking page layout app gives you the power to combine your images, graphics and text to produce stunning publications of the highest quality.

[More info \- about Affinity Publisher](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/publisher/)

![Image 8: Baseline grid and typography dialog boxes open on top of blue NEW MUSIC EXCLUSIVE feature article](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/home/0423/publisher-home-150520230710--sm@2x.jpg)

Affinity V2 Universal License
-----------------------------

Get Version 2 of Affinity Designer, Affinity Photo and Affinity Publisher on all operating systems, including iPad, for one low bundle price.

All apps. All platforms.No subscription.

USD$164.99

One-off payment | excl. tax

Buy now \- Universal License [Upgrade from V1 \- Universal License](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/store/upgrade-offer/) [Free trial \- Universal License](https://store.serif.com/get/universal-licence-2/trial/)

![Image 9: Affinity Designer 2 logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/logos/affinity-designer-2-020520191502.svg)

*   **Affinity Designer 2** | macOS
*   **Affinity Designer 2** | Windows
*   **Affinity Designer 2** | iPadOS

*   **Affinity Publisher 2** | Windows
*   **Affinity Publisher 2** | iPadOS

More than 3,000,000 users worldwide
-----------------------------------

Since its inception, Affinity has gained the trust of professionals across the globe and picked up some of the industry’s most prestigious awards. It’s now being used by more than three million users (and counting!), delivering a next-level experience for photographers, designers, artists, architects, students, teachers, publishers, hobbyists and others looking for top tier creative software without sky-high subscription fees.

*   ![Image 12: Apple’s Design Award](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/accolades/apple-design-award-090520190839.svg)

StudioLink: the most seamless workflow ever conceived in a creative suite
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

From within Affinity Publisher, you can instantly access the advanced toolsets of Affinity Designer and Affinity Photo without ever leaving your layout thanks to the world-first StudioLink technology. No more app switching, file format conversion or frustration – it’s the biggest gamechanger to the creative workflow in years!

![Image 38: Photo composition shows different elements of a magazine being created using the three app personas in Affinity Publisher using StudioLink](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/home/0423/studiolink-090520231352--lg@2x.jpg)

No subscription.
----------------

Version 2 of the Affinity apps are available to buy with a one-time payment. This not only gets you the latest and greatest versions of Affinity, but you will also receive free updates until such a time Version 3 is released!

We offer incredibly flexible licensing options – either pick and choose which apps you want, or opt for the Universal License and get the whole suite on all platforms for one low price.

[Purchase options](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/affinity-pricing/)

*   ![Image 39: Simpsonhaugh brand logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/teams/simpsonhaugh-logo-081020191046.svg)
*   ![Image 40: Alma Media brand logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/teams/alma-media-logo-081020191046.svg)
*   ![Image 41: Miele brand logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/teams/miele-logo-081020191046.svg)
*   ![Image 42: Hok brand logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/teams/hok-logo-081020191046.svg)
*   ![Image 43: Swoon brand logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/teams/swoon-logo-081020191046.svg)

Business and education
----------------------

Creative software has now become essential for the workplace and the classroom. We work closely with educators, business leaders and other professionals across the globe to help them get started with Affinity. If you’re interested in purchasing for your business or educational institution, see our dedicated pages for further details.

[Business](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/business/) [Education](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/education/)

For creatives, by creatives
---------------------------

Embedded in our ethos is a focus on customer experience and community. We’re constantly striving to improve our apps, using initiatives like the Affinity [beta program](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/affinity-beta-program/) to gain valuable feedback from our users and ensure future updates address what you really want.

We also regularly share a variety of content on our website and other platforms, providing informative resources on our [Learn pages](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/learn/), insightful articles on [Affinity Spotlight](https://affinityspotlight.com/) and [creative sessions](https://affin.co/creativesessions/) on YouTube for anyone looking for some inspiration. Additionally, our Affinity Store houses a range of brush packs and other [add-ons](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/store/) to help you enhance your work, and we’re always updating our collection to offer you the best tools.

So whether you’re an existing Affinity customer interested in [upgrading from V1](https://affinity.serif.com/en-us/store/upgrade-offer/) or have just discovered us, we hope you’ll find everything you need for your creative process.
